title: Bad Management Kills Your Favourite Tech Company or How Software Companies Die
author: Dmitry K
body: Do you wonder if your company is on the path to becoming a part of history that nobody remembers? 30 years later, and as someone from a completely different generation of techies, I'm revisiting a classic essay by Orson Scott Card on the age-old clash between coders and corporate culture. Get ready for a thought-provoking dose of nostalgia 😅 👉 Are the ideas in this piece still relevant today?
